casebody.data:
BATES v. AMERICAN BUILDING & LOAN ASS’N et al. REED et al. v. SOLOMONS et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. January 20, 1903.) No. 1,198. Appeal and Cross-Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Northern District of Georgia. O. J. Haden, for appellant. J. H. Porter, for appellees. H. B. Tompkins and Robt. C. Alston, for cross-appellants.

Before PARDEE, McCORMICK, and SHELBY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The opinions of Judge Newman (116 Fed. 676, 679), filed in this case seem to be well considered, and his conclusions correct, and we therefore affirm the decree appealed from. The costs of this court to be paid by the appellant and cross-appellant, one-half by each party.
